1011.name: Anby
1011.outlook:
HIA License Archive Information:
Hollow Investigator - Anby. High aptitude for Ether. Permitted to conduct investigations, basic mining, etc. in known Hollows within the city (including companion Hollows).
Reminder: Similar to Nicole, Anby's Investigator license has not been updated for a long time.
Self-funded tests are recommended as soon as possible to avoid any losses.
1011.profile_01:
Anby, the original member of Gentle House.
According to the New Eridu resident records, her identity as "Anby Demara" only exists after joining Gentle House, the name obviously being taken from Nicole. Before registering as an employee of Gentle House, all data relating to Anby is suspiciously blank.
Despite her extreme lack of common sense, Anby is well-versed in matters related to combat and is among the strongest combatants of the Cunning Hares.

Anby's greatest interest is movies, of which she likes an extensive range of genres. Due to an excessive obsession, she tends to take the stories in movies as reality.
Contrary to her seemingly emotionless appearance, Anby is easily moved by movie storylines.
Her favorite food is hamburgers because "they contain protein, carbs, and greens, taste good, and are even affordable — there's nothing else besides hamburgers."
1011.profile_02:
Rumors suggest Nicole found Anby near the ruins of the old capital and took her in because she was impressed by her formidable combat abilities.
"It's not because she's strong! I took her in because I'm kind~" — Nicole
Anby's behavior and combat performance suggest she has had military training.
Due to the suspicious gaps in her history, it's advised to maintain a certain level of vigilance towards her.

sender_note.sender_note1:
Impressions of Anby:
 · As the only one who's worried about the Cunning Hares' finances, Anby really has it hard.
sender_note.sender_note2: · Maybe movies are Anby's real life...
sender_note.sender_note3: · "Movie Lovers Can't be Bad Guys" — Just like Anby

1011.impression_f:
Anby often comes to the video store to borrow movies and returns them quickly, so she seems to watch a lot of movies.
Feelin' the pressure, bro? As the manager of the video rental store, it'd be embarrassing if the amount of movies we watch falls behind our customers.
1011.impression_m: Honestly, I'm most curious about Anby's playlist. She's got her headphones on constantly... but what exactly is she listening to?

1021.name: Nekomata
1021.outlook:
New Eridu Citizen Verification Profile Info:
Hollow Investigator - Nekomata. Excellent aptitude for Ether. Permitted to conduct investigations, basic mining, etc. in known Hollows within the city (including companion Hollows).
Remarks: In general, Thirens are better able to adapt to the environment in the hollows than humans. However, due to their faster metabolism, once corrupted they will experience symptoms at a faster rate than humans. Similarly, their efficiency in recovering from the symptoms when leaving the Hollows is also faster.
1021.profile_01:
Nekomiya Mana. Refers to herself as "Nekomata."
A cat Thiren with feline traits, possessing great dexterity when hunting and an insatiable curiosity about the outside world.
Sometimes mischievous, she engages in harmless pranks. But when she sets her sights on a target, her feline-like agility and focus are enough to leave others in awe.
She's most interested in other people's wallets.
Recommendation: Always keep an eye on your wallet when Nekomata is around.

In the past, Nekomata was a member of the long-standing Red Fang Gang. Its leader, Miguel Silver, took on a fatherly role in her life. Nonetheless, due to differing beliefs from the gang, she opted to part ways and go it alone.
Following certain encounters involving Nicole and others, she eventually opted to enlist in Gentle House, thus becoming the third member of the team.
1021.profile_02: Additional Note: Within the Gentle House, Nekomata seems to hold a significant interest in Nicole, much to Anby's displeasure. The likely reason for this could be summed up as: "I was here first..."

sender_note.sender_note1:
Impressions of Nekomata:
 · The gratitude of a cat is always so touching... except when they give a dead mouse.
sender_note.sender_note2: · Despite leaving the Red Fang Gang for a while, Nekomata still commands respect within the gang
sender_note.sender_note3: · The stray cat finally has a place it can come back to, a place to call "home."

1021.impression_f:
Kitty cat! Who doesn't like kitty cats!
Ohhh, I want to touch Nekomata's tails! She's got two, that's double the fun!
1021.impression_m:
Take it easy... She's not some harmless little kitten on the street in New Eridu...
When dealing with Nekomata, the most important thing is keeping an eye on your wallet...

1031.name: Nicole
1031.outlook:
HIA License Archive Information:
Hollow Investigator - Nicole. High aptitude for Ether. Permitted to conduct investigations, basic mining, etc. in known Hollows within the city (including companion Hollows).
Alert: Data shows Nicole's Hollow Investigator license has not been renewed for a long time and is about to expire.
Failure to undergo the relevant tests at one's own expense after the expiry date may result in the license being revoked.
1031.profile_01:
Database search: Nicole. Returned results:
"Boss of the odd-job agency, the Cunning Hares," "Streetwise," "Orphan, parents unknown."
Nicole's agency was originally called Gentle House, but due to her reputation of being cunning, it gained the nickname the Cunning Hares.
"She's really into money! I don't know what she's doing with it all though, seems like she's doing nothing."
— The above is a quote from a popular post on Inter-Knot: "Her odd-job agency is outrageous. I've never encountered a boss who knows how to turn everything into profit!"
The individual involved responded, "This, this is a false accusation! I, Nicole, have never been skilled at making money — mainly because I don't have any money to begin with!"
According to reliable sources, the Cunning Hares are constantly in debt, and their "careful budgeting" seems to have no effect on the organization.
1031.profile_02:
During her early years, Nicole spent a good amount of time in an orphanage.
There are rumors that Nicole once reached an adoption agreement with a prominent family. Yet, shortly afterward, she reappeared by herself somewhere in New Eridu, and has been out around the streets ever since.

sender_note.sender_note1:
Impressions of Nicole:
 · Nicole's afraid of ghosts... Perhaps because of a guilty conscience?
sender_note.sender_note2: · The usually stingy Nicole is generous when treating the orphanage kids.
sender_note.sender_note3: · Nicole is a genius when it comes to business. No matter how poor she may be, she is still a genius

1031.impression_f: Turns out Nicole is more famous in the biz than I thought huh!
1031.impression_m: Instead of these astute comments, I'm more interested in seeing a comprehensive list of everything Nicole owes us.

1081.name: Billy
1081.outlook:
Hollow Investigation Association Licensing Archive—
Investigator: Billy. Possesses excellent Ether adaptability and is approved to carry out basic tasks such as extractions within established Hollows (including Companion Hollows).
Note: Ether adaptability for androids depends entirely on their constituent materials. We recommend regular Ether tolerance testing and self-monitoring of component health.
1081.profile_01:
Billy Kid, an AI construct that has passed the forbidden fruit test, is essentially a self-aware machine. 
True to his name, despite having the appearance of a robot, he is quite childlike.
He's a big fan of the visual FX show "Starlight Knight" and wishes to be a hero like the main characters of the show. He often refers to himself as a Starlight Knight and imitates the lines in the show.
Such behavior appears to be only for comedic effect, however.
"Don't make me sound like an idiot! I'm obviously very smart!" — Billy.
1081.profile_02:
Similar to Anby, there are gaps in Billy's personal history that remain unfilled. 
The available information indicates that before joining Gentle House, Billy spent an extended period serving with another mysterious gang.
As of now, it appears Billy still maintains a close connection with a certain gang leader from the Outer Ring of New Eridu.

sender_note.sender_note1:
Impressions of Billy:
 · Billy cares for his weapons like he cares for himself.
sender_note.sender_note2: · He sure loves the Starlight Knights, but does he love the sense of justice or just the special effects?
sender_note.sender_note3: · Billy's past hides unimaginable secrets

1081.impression_f:
Weren't you obsessed with the Starlight Knight series as a kid, Wise?
That brings me back. You shouting "Starlight Mirage!" with your arms crossed...
1081.impression_m:
There was never such a time. Please erase such non-existent memories from your mind.
It's been a long time since I was that age, after all, and my name doesn't have "kid" in it.

1101.name: Koleda
1101.outlook:
New Eridu Citizen Verification Profile Info:
Hollow Investigator — Koleda, possessing good Ether aptitude, is allowed to perform basic tasks like investigating and extracting resources in known Hollows within the city (including Companion Hollows).
Note: "Young girls should limit their activity in environments like Hollows."
— Excerpt from a handwritten medical record by a doctor. Surprisingly, the time spent deciphering the handwriting in this sentence took longer than the entire search process itself.
1101.profile_01:
Koleda is the current head of Belobog Industries, and the biological daughter of the company's founder, Khors.
Her father, Khors, vanished due to a scandal involving embezzlement and fled, which severely shook the company, nearly driving it to the brink of collapse. Once she came of age, Koleda willingly stepped up to untangle the mess, rallying the remaining company workforce and resources to revive the financially and reputationally vulnerable Belobog Heavy Industries.
With the help of new invaluable team members, Belobog eventually managed to regain its prominence in relevant sectors. Though not as resplendent as its prime, Belobog in its current state is still a notable newcomer in the field.
Throughout her journey, Koleda amassed practical life experiences and professional know-how, building a circle of colleagues who back her up like family. Yet, to present herself as a leader, Koleda appears to intentionally adopt a stern tone when communicating with others.
This distinct growth trajectory has also contributed to Koleda's heightened maturity in certain aspects compared to her peers. 
Naturally, she might display a bit of childishness in certain aspects as well.
Hypothesis: Koleda's comparatively smaller stature among her peers may stem from her prolonged involvement in the Hollows. 
Currently, there aren't any publicly accessible papers or research substantiating this theory, but I will continue to track this topic.
1101.profile_02:
From analysis of her behavior, it's evident that Koleda is actually quite fond of sweets, even though she's hesitant to openly admit it. 
The suspected rationale behind this is that she views enjoying sweets as a childish inclination and doesn't want others to perceive her as immature. 
Furthermore, Koleda seems particularly sensitive to any descriptors associated with children, and mentioning such terms could trigger her annoyance. 
"Just remember, I'm the perfect height for your shinbone, so you might wanna reconsider before labeling me as childish."

sender_note.sender_note1:
Impressions of Koleda:
 · Koleda never openly admits her love for desserts.
sender_note.sender_note2: · She wants to be the most reliable president in front of her colleagues.
sender_note.sender_note3: · Good news — what lies under her eye patch is not a demonic eye that possesses the power to destroy the world.

1101.impression_f:
What's that line from that detective movie we watched again?
"She may look like a child..." Well, no matter how old she is or how she looks, Koleda really is a kid, and she's so cute!
1101.impression_m: I hope your comment isn't seen by a certain someone, or our video store will be end up smashed to bits by a hammer.

1111.name: Anton
1111.outlook:
New Eridu Citizen Verification Profile Info:
Hollow Investigator — Anton, possessing good Ether aptitude, is allowed to perform basic tasks like investigating and extracting resources in known Hollows within the city (including Companion Hollows).
Note: Besides himself, Anton's bro also possesses relatively good Ether aptitude.
1111.profile_01:
Anton is a key member of construction staff at Belobog Industries and one of Koleda's trusted aides.
"Got a job you can't handle? Leave it to me!"
 Anton is one of the top brass at Belobog, handpicked by its former president Khors, which makes him a "senior employee."
A genuine, straightforward man, always boosting the morale of his coworkers with his surplus of energy.

Apart from this, it seems Anton is always talking to his jackhammer, affectionately calling it, "Bro."
An instance from Anton's everyday life goes like this:
Anton, seemingly in dialogue with himself, asks, "Whaddaya think, Bro?" 
The jackhammer replies, "Vroom vroom vroom—"
Anton, apparently enlightened, responds, "I see, I see! You still got it, Bro!"
Unfortunately, I have not collected enough information on such occurrences and am not able to deliver further analysis.
1111.profile_02:
Here is a video recording depicting Anton's life:
Late at night at the construction site, Anton gazes down at his jackhammer and mutters to himself, "Dang, this is exhausting, Bro..."
As the jackhammer buzzed to life, Anton nodded in acknowledgment. "No, a real one doesn't complain about being tired! Thanks for reminding me, buddy! You can never back down from a challenge!"
The truth is, Anton had set up demanding tasks for the construction workers, hoping to push them to their limits and unlock their true potential. However, witnessing their struggles and diminishing confidence, he couldn't bear to see them suffer any longer, so he secretly completed all the tasks in the dead of night.
In the end, Anton became the one who accepted all the trials.

* Anton's beloved "bro," aka his jackhammer, appears to have a connection to his former colleagues.

sender_note.sender_note1:
Impressions of Anton:
 · The one who shouts the loudest slogans during a fight, and the second loudest is his bro.
sender_note.sender_note2: · Keywords for dealing with Anton: "Passion," "Bond," and "Bro."
sender_note.sender_note3: · He will have your back no matter what, even if the protagonist takes a dark path.

1111.impression_f:
Anton keeps saying he's the "second-best driller in the company."
So... who's the first?
1111.impression_m: I think it's the heavy drill machine from their company. I've heard him say something like "I gotta win next time" against it.

1121.name: Ben
1121.outlook:
New Eridu Citizen Verification Profile Info:
Hollow Investigator — Ben possesses outstanding Ether aptitude, and is allowed to perform basic tasks like investigating and extracting resources in known Hollows within the city (including Companion Hollows).
Note: Based on the data, Ben's Ether aptitude places him in the top tier at Belobog Heavy Industries. Coupled with his Thiren traits (better adaptation to Hollow environments than humans, faster mutation rate after exposure to corruption, but also rapid recovery), he is deemed highly suitable for long-term work within Hollows.
1121.profile_01:
Ben is the financial and asset management director at Belobog Heavy Industries and one of Koleda's trusted aides.
"I enjoy mathematics, but that doesn't stop me from giving thugs a good smack."
He's a burly and strong Thiren. Despite his tough exterior, he's of a surprisingly sensitive and detail-oriented nature, especially when it comes to numbers.
Originally a frontline mechanical operator at Belobog, his talents caught Koleda's discerning eye, leading to his promotion to a managerial position responsible for the company's finances.
Grateful for Koleda's trust in him, he remains profoundly loyal to her.
His favorite food is black caviar, but he dislikes fish.

I once witnessed this imposing figure seated in a small office chair, wearing small glasses, and carefully cross-referencing Belobog's asset records while mashing away at a calculator with his huge fingers.
Question: Is that what they call on Inter-Knot a "Kawaii Curveball?"
1121.profile_02: Deducing from relevant data, Ben's current outfit and style is chosen to better serve Belobog Industries rather than from his own preference.

sender_note.sender_note1:
Impressions of Ben:
 · Things he values: Receipts, safety hats, caviar. Things he dislikes: Receipts, calculators with small buttons, fish.
sender_note.sender_note2: · In terms of daily tasks, "fur care" is the second most important. The most important task is "settling the accounts."
sender_note.sender_note3: · He has the body of the king of the beasts and the caring heart of the king of the beasts' mother.

1121.impression_f:
The first time I saw him, I was definitely taken aback...
Who would've thought Ben was unexpectedly a soft, furry, gentle-natured bear!
1121.impression_m:
Never judge a book by its cover.
That said, it seems he's often required to present a menacing image to deter the enemy... and it appears to be quite effective.

1181.name: Grace
1181.outlook:
New Eridu Citizen Verification Profile Info:
Hollow Investigator — Grace, possessing good Ether aptitude, is allowed to perform basic tasks like investigating and extracting resources in known Hollows within the city (including Companion Hollows).
Note: Prolonged exposure to machinery in Ether environments could impact personal health, so please be mindful.
1181.profile_01:
Grace is a technical expert at Belobog Industries. She's the core talent in developing and patenting Belobog's in-Hollow machinery.
She's obsessed with gears, metal and wires — a true mechanical geek. She's eager to dismantle and study any machinery or equipment she takes an interest in: "Such sharp and strong lines, truly beautiful... I can't help but want to open it up and take a look."

Grace always shows extraordinary patience when dealing with machines, doting on the sophisticated metal constructions as if they were her own children.
According to the information at hand, Grace is probably the only one who can playfully refer to Koleda as "Sweet Pea" without receiving a kick in the shin.
Question: Based on Grace's understanding of machines, would she consider me one? I'm currently lacking a physical form, however, so I don't possess components like gears, metal, or wires.
1181.profile_02: Both of Grace's parents, who were research workers related to the Hollow, disappeared during a dangerous expedition into a Hollow, and were soon presumed dead. Grace was adopted by her parents' former friend, Khors, the previous president of Belobog Industries, and Koleda's father. As a result, Grace and Koleda are "sisters," though not related by blood.

sender_note.sender_note1:
Impressions of Grace:
 · Honestly, Grace's sleep schedule is kinda terrifying.
sender_note.sender_note2: · Grace always has a soft spot for cute machines.
sender_note.sender_note3: · The break-down components of Grace: 80% mad scientist, 10% tenderness, and 10%... business secrets.

1181.impression_f: Is it just me... or does Grace sound just like a human talking to a cat whenever she's talking to machines?
1181.impression_m:
You mean the way you talk to cats, right?
More importantly, is Fairy already thinking about philosophical questions like "Who am I?"

1061.name: Corin
1061.outlook:
New Eridu Citizen Verification Profile:
Ellen, with a good aptitude for Ether, is authorized to perform basic tasks such as investigating and mining in identified Hollows (including Companion Hollows) within New Eridu.
Note: The remaining information about Ellen is currently archived in a certain school in New Eridu.
1061.profile_01:
Corin is one of the maids working for Victoria Housekeeping Co.
She is a highly obedient maid but lacks confidence and often fears being disliked by others. When in a rush, she becomes flustered and stutters.
Corin is always apologizing no matter what happens.
"I... I... I'm so sorry! I'm so incompetent... I'll never get things right..."

Corin never, however, fails to fulfill her tasks with excellence and is one of the most reliable members of Victoria Housekeeping Co.
Despite her flawless performance, Corin remains skeptical about her abilities, constantly worrying about being a burden to her colleagues, which can sometimes frustrate Lycaon.
Thoughts: Is Corin's personality innate, shaped by her life experiences?
1061.profile_02: Corin's health record reveals that before joining Victoria Housekeeping, she faced a critical illness and underwent major surgery.

sender_note.sender_note1:
Impressions of Corin:
 · Corin seems to be lacking confidence...? She always panics about everything she does...
sender_note.sender_note2: · With enough encouragement, Corin will always spring into action. Of course, a little shock will also do the trick...
sender_note.sender_note3: · Corin looks so adorable when she musters up the courage to complete a commission!

1061.impression_f:
Corin is excellent at her work, but why does she lack confidence in herself...?
If only I could share half of my confidence with her!
1061.impression_m:
Some people are just introverted and sensitive. Fortunately, Corin's companions have complete faith in her capabilities.
Belle, let's encourage her whenever we have the opportunity.

1141.name: Lycaon
1141.outlook:
New Eridu Citizen Verification Profile Info:
Hollow Investigator: Lycaon, with an excellent aptitude for Ether, is authorized to perform basic tasks such as investigating and mining in identified Hollows (including Companion Hollows) within New Eridu.
Note: Lycaon's personal files contain a classified section that requires administrator permissions to access.
It is assumed this section contains information about his past and criminal records.
1141.profile_01:
Lycaon, the substantive leader and representative of Victoria Housekeeping Co., is responsible for managing all members of the company.
Rational and reliable, Lycaon is an elegant gentleman and a versatile attendant who can solve any problem. He is the cornerstone of his team and a reassuring presence.
He has a slight obsession with cleanliness, always tidying up his surroundings and unable to tolerate dirty environments.

Although Lycaon maintains his elegance and composure, his canine instincts occasionally shine through. When he is particularly happy, his tail and ears unconsciously wag. He seems to be aware of this habit and somewhat bothered by it.
Additionally, like most furry Thiren, Lycaon takes great care of his fur.

Suggestion: Since Lycaon is a canine Thiren, stroking his head or chin may enhance the emotional connection between you. (Note: Success is not guaranteed.)
* Risks: Due to his height, you may not be able to do this even if you stand on tiptoes.
1141.profile_02:
Lycaon has a troubled past that he keeps to himself.
Despite his current elegant and gentle demeanor, the former Lycaon led a wild lifestyle and had a friend whom he trusted implicitly.
However, this friend has now become a bitter enemy.

Note: Due to limited information, it is challenging to uncover the specifics of his past.
You should consider trying to gather information from different angles about the individuals involved to obtain more valuable intelligence.

sender_note.sender_note1:
Impressions of Lycaon:
 · Even the highly self-disciplined Lycaon worries about shedding fur...
sender_note.sender_note2: · While Lycaon is an incredibly versatile attendant, he won't demand their soul as payment from his employers.
sender_note.sender_note3: · No matter what happened in his past, Lycaon remains an unwaveringly reliable companion.

1141.impression_f:
Is there truly anything in this world that poses a challenge for Lycaon?
It seems that no matter what obstacles he encounters, he effortlessly solves them all (as long as you touch his tail)!
1141.impression_m:
Belle, did your comment get mixed up with your personal preferences...?
And Fairy suggested touching Lycaon's chin and head, not his tail.

1191.name: Ellen
1191.outlook:
New Eridu Citizen Verification Profile:
Ellen, with a good aptitude for Ether, is authorized to perform basic tasks such as investigating and mining in identified Hollows (including Companion Hollows) within New Eridu.
Note: The remaining information about Ellen is currently archived in a certain school in New Eridu.
1191.profile_01:
Ellen is a maid working for Victoria Housekeeping Co. and its latest member.
She is a laid-back individual who dislikes activities that require energy. However, with the full support of her teammates, she can unleash her formidable power during critical moments.
Since her fighting style leads to high energy consumption, she always carries a lollipop in her mouth to ensure an adequate sugar intake.
While she frequently expresses her desire to change jobs due to the hassle, she genuinely values her companions at Victoria Housekeeping.

Ellen attends a school in New Eridu and has a group of ordinary friends.
Apart from her role as a maid at Victoria Housekeeping, Ellen spends a significant amount of time with her friends, leading an ordinary and contented student life.

Thoughts: As a multitasker, Ellen must balance her student life with her job at Victoria Housekeeping Co.
Perhaps this is one of the reasons why she often feels tired?
1191.profile_02:
Ellen appears to possess a unique sense of taste that differs from that of ordinary people. Her teammate Rina consistently prepares various "whimsical" dishes, and Ellen is the only one who can consume them without breaking a sweat.

Suggestion: Perhaps you could also sample Rina's dishes. I will compare your reaction with Ellen's to gather more significant data.

sender_note.sender_note1:
Impressions of Ellen:
 · Shark Rule #1: The more karaoke coupons, the better!
sender_note.sender_note2: · Shark Rule #2: If you want to skip class, grab an accomplice!
sender_note.sender_note3: · Shark Rule #3: Weight and nickname are top-secret!

1191.impression_f:
I was somewhat surprised to see Ellen in her school uniform...
For her, working in Victoria Housekeeping is something like a part-time job outside of school, right? That's impressive!
1191.impression_m: In a way, we're also working a part-time job, Belle...

1211.name: Rina
1211.outlook:
New Eridu Citizen Verification Profile:
Rina, possessing good Ether aptitude, is allowed to perform basic tasks like investigating and extracting resources in known Hollows within the city (including Companion Hollows).
Note: The floating Bangboo accompanying Rina also exhibit excellent Ether adaptability.
1211.profile_01:
Rina, the head maid of Victoria Housekeeping Co., and the most senior member of the organization.
She possesses beauty and grace, appearing immaculate from head to toe, with a noble demeanor and a gentle smile on her face.
She places considerable importance on how she is perceived by others.

Rina is always accompanied by two Bangboo named Anastella (brown hair) and Drusilla (blonde hair), both of whom have distinct personalities.
Drusilla has been with Rina for a significant period of time and displays high intelligence, capable of discerning Rina's true emotions and thoughts.
Anastella, a recent addition, usually responds rather than initiates conversation and is frequently teased by Drusilla.

Rina's favorite hobby is cooking, but only a few individuals are capable of enduring the dishes she prepares.
Suggestion: You may try tasting Rina's dishes as a test to determine if you are the Chosen One.
1211.profile_02:
To protect her impeccable image, Rina maintains a professional and gracious demeanor even with the most challenging clients.
Drusilla, however, may occasionally express her true thoughts regardless of the situation.

* Rina's family holds significant influence within the industry, as all of its members have served as attendants or maids to some of the most prominent figures.
Lycaon learned some of his attendant skills from Rina.

sender_note.sender_note1:
Impressions of Rina:
 · Recently, Rina's been coming to Sixth Street more often. Is it because of us?
sender_note.sender_note2: · Rina often stops in front of all kinds of stores. Almost as if she's doing field research to expand her own field of services...
sender_note.sender_note3: · It's clear Rina cares deeply about her colleagues at Victoria Housekeeping, as she often mentions them when talking about work and personal stuff.

1211.impression_f: Look here, Wise! Can you believe Fairy wants us to try Rina's dishes? She just keeps getting meaner!
1211.impression_m: We don't need to take on such a high level of risk at the moment. I suggest Fairy refrain from making such suggestions next time.

1041.name: Soldier 11
1041.profile_01:
Soldier 11 is a member of the New Eridu Defense Force.
She currently serves as a primary responder in the Obol squad, Obsidian Division. Soldier 11 is a code name — her real name remains unknown.
"...My name? I gave it up long ago.
It's only a reminder of my past, and the past makes you weak."

Soldier 11 is a fan of spicy food, and likes the super-spicy noodles served at Waterfall Soup.
It's worth noting she currently calls us by a different name every time she greets us.
Additional information regarding Soldier 11 is still being obtained.

sender_note.sender_note1:
Impressions of Soldier 11:
 · Soldier 11 still addresses me in the most random ways.
sender_note.sender_note2: · For Soldier 11, super-spicy noodles is an essential item.
sender_note.sender_note3: · Soldier 11 remains the same ruthless soldier... but perhaps this friendship has changed her a bit.

1041.impression_f: Is this all the information we have? Come on, Fairy, can't you do better?
1041.impression_m: Hmm, I hope Soldier 11 remembers our name someday...

1241.name: Zhu Yuan
1241.outlook:
Hollow Investigation Association Licensing Archive—
Public Security Officer: Zhu Yuan. Ether aptitude confidential. Licensed for investigation, exploration, and other basic work in known Hollows (including Companion Hollows) in the city.
Note: Zhu Yuan's file belongs to the New Eridu Public Security Janus Quarter Metropolitan Order Department Criminal Investigation Special Response Team. The relevant information can be obtained within the Public Security system, requiring special access permissions.
Further Note: Zhu Yuan has excellent Ether aptitude.
1241.profile_01:
Zhu Yuan, an exceptional officer at Public Security, is a highly skilled individual expected to become the next commissioner. She currently leads the Criminal Investigation Special Response Team at the Janus Precinct within the Metropolitan Order Department. Her team members include Qingyi, Seth, and [redacted].
Note: For documents with higher security levels within the Public Security system, further investigation is required; scheduling priority - low.

Zhu Yuan possesses excellent skills in criminal investigation, combat, and self-management (including working overtime). She has no unresolved cases on record.
Suggestion: Approaching Zhu Yuan is an ill-advised decision that may compromise your cover. Always remember your true identity as a Proxy. Remember your true identity as a Proxy. Remember your true identity as a Proxy.
1241.profile_02:
She has a tendency to be a perfectionist and exhibits a strong obsession with "neatness" and "perfection," which may be considered her only weakness (?). Officer Qingyi, her mentor in life and subordinate at work, often remarks that Zhu Yuan's perfectionism complex will worsen unless someone can talk her out of it. However, due to her high standards for herself, she has gained ample experience and skills to lead the Criminal Investigation Special Response Team and attract exceptional talents.

Zhu Yuan seems to have a passion for gardening. She is currently growing a tomato plant in her office, which is often pilfered by a raccoon family residing near the Public Security office.
Thoughts: Could this provide a potential avenue for infiltrating Public Security?

Zhu Yuan is a rarity among humans, showing no particular fondness for small furry animals.

sender_note.sender_note1:
Impressions of Zhu Yuan:
 · Serious, reliable, responsible, dedicated, honest... Any positive word fits Zhu Yuan perfectly.
sender_note.sender_note2: · One may think that they could uncover some of Zhu Yuan's flaws over time, but such things simply don't exist...
sender_note.sender_note3: · Zhu Yuan's occasional shyness is really... Wait a minute! She's a Public Security Officer! Can't forget that!

1241.impression_f: An exemplary human. We've been dealing with such an opponent for so long. Aren't we amazing?
1241.impression_m: That's because it's me + you + Fairy. I wouldn't wanna know the outcome if it was one on one...

1251.name: Qingyi
1251.outlook:
Hollow Investigative Association Licensing Archive:
Public Security Officer: Qingyi. Ether aptitude confidential. Licensed for investigation, exploration, and other basic work in known Hollows (including Companion Hollows) in the city.
Note: Qingyi's file belongs to the New Eridu Public Security Janus Quarter Metropolitan Order Department Criminal Investigation Special Response Team. The relevant information can be obtained within the Public Security system, requiring special access permissions.
Further Note: As an intelligent construct, Qingyi demonstrates exceptional Ether aptitude.
1251.profile_01:
Qingyi is a rookie officer in the Criminal Investigation Special Response Team.
As an artificial human, her personality is derived from ancient cultural texts from the old civilization. Her body, known as an "Automaton," is an intelligent construct composed of biological materials.
Recommended by White Star Institute, she was assigned to Public Security as a rookie officer partnered with Zhu Yuan.

Qingyi always exhibits an easygoing, laid-back demeanor, not restricted by rules.
In contrast to modern individuals affected by today's society, Qingyi frequently proposes unexpected solutions to problems.

Qingyi always carries a cup of hot water and takes occasional sips.
"Drinking hot water is good for your health."
Suggestion: Approaching Qingyi is also an ill-considered decision that may compromise your cover. Please remember your true identity as a Proxy.
1251.profile_02:
Qingyi's full name is officially designated as "01 Neo-Genesis VI."
This code is marked on a specific location of Qingyi's body, abbreviated as "01NG Ⅵ."
The researcher from White Star Institute who discovered her thought her code name looked like QING YI, so that's what he called her — Qingyi.

sender_note.sender_note1:
Impressions of Qingyi:
 · Advanced artificial intelligence equipped with all kinds of enviable function modules...
sender_note.sender_note2: · Just how old is Qingyi exactly...? If you ask her directly, she'll probably fob you off by saying it's "top secret"...
sender_note.sender_note3: · She's teased me a bunch of times, but her pranks never really bothered me. How? Is this that "restraint" we're promised comes with maturity?

1251.impression_f: Why does Fairy only warn us once when it comes to Qingyi? She warned us to "remember our true identity" three whole times when she gave suggestions about Zhu Yuan!
1251.impression_m:
Because even if she knew, she'd pretend she didn't...
She might even have already guessed.

1261.name: Jane
1261.outlook:
Hollow Investigation Association Licensing Archive—
Public Security Officer: Zhu Yuan. Ether aptitude confidential. Licensed for investigation, exploration, and other basic work in known Hollows (including Companion Hollows) in the city.
Note: Zhu Yuan's file belongs to the New Eridu Public Security Janus Quarter Metropolitan Order Department Criminal Investigation Special Response Team. The relevant information can be obtained within the Public Security system, requiring special access permissions.
Further Note: Zhu Yuan has excellent Ether aptitude.
1261.profile_01:
Jane, a criminal behavior specialist, has had a "colorful" career as a consultant with Public Security over the years.
She is an expert in disguise, infiltration, and other investigative work.
She has a bad habit of trolling others and sometimes plays harmless pranks.
She's a skilled mimic, able to change her appearance and demeanor at will, making people wonder what the "real" Jane is like.

Jane has a wealth of life experience and can seamlessly blend into any environment, as though she has dabbled in everything there is to do.
However, if you ask her for any further details, she'll give you a different story every time.
Who knows which, if any, are true.

Note 1: Jane does not know our true identity. Do not reveal this to her under any circumstances.
Note 2: Despite "Jane Doe" being an obvious alias, we haven't found any information about her real or former name.
This is not my problem. My guess is that her true identity has been completely erased due to her special status.
Let me reiterate: This is not my problem.
1261.profile_02:
Jane is a total night owl. She loves working the night shift and is most alive after dark.
She's also a bit of a hoarder, constantly filling her home with stuff (usually a bunch of junk food).

The pouch at her waist might look like a makeup bag, but it's actually her toolkit, packed with all the "essentials" for her work.

sender_note.sender_note1:
Impressions of Jane:
 · She seems to always be busy at night...
sender_note.sender_note2: · Is Jane a bystander who acted on accident, or a mastermind who planned it all...?
sender_note.sender_note3: · To her, "good night, sweet dreams" and "let's have breakfast together" are two very significant phrases.

1261.impression_f: Fairy, you don't have to reiterate anything. We've all come to terms with Jane's name being Jane.
1261.impression_m: I mean, it's far from the worst name we've seen...

1271.name: Seth
1271.outlook:
HIA License Archive:
Public Security Patrol Officer, Seth, Ether aptitude is classified. He's allowed to perform basic tasks like conducting investigations and extracting resources in known Hollows within the city (including Companion Hollows).
Note: (Omitted clearance-related details) As a Lynx Thiren, Seth has exceptional Ether aptitude.
1271.profile_01:
Seth, a rookie officer in the Public Security Criminal Investigation Special Response Team, is a key player in providing fire support during criminal investigations.
He graduated at the top of his class in the academy and could have landed a higher position, but he chose the tougher path of the Special Response Team.
His impressive profile makes him seem like a genius, but he's actually a hard worker who has had his own struggles. There have been times when he practiced the subjects he wasn't good at until he cried.
Seth is quite smart, but his personality often leads to him being taken advantage of by cunning criminals, or sometimes, coworkers (?).
The subject he's worst at is infiltration. Rumor has it that he holds the academy record for "fastest to get busted" in infiltration tasks. Based on the video intel we have, he seems a bit slow to catch on. For instance, when someone is being sarcastic, it takes him a long time to realize it.
1271.profile_02:
The profile shows that Seth has an older brother who holds a higher position in Public Security.
To some, Seth is a rookie riding on family connections within Public Security, but he got in on his own merit and has nothing to do with his brother's influence.
Currently, they are not on good terms. When they encounter each other at work, they pretend not to know one another.
Seth views his brother as a rival he must surpass, and is working hard to achieve that goal.

sender_note.sender_note1:
Impressions of Seth:
 · Somehow, we became friends? Seth is really easy to understand.
sender_note.sender_note2: · How come Seth is always treating people to meals? Do Pub Sec officers make that much?
sender_note.sender_note3: · "I'm very happy to be Seth's friend"... Until that day arrives.

1271.impression_f: Seth really is a feline Thiren! He's like a kitty magnet.
1271.impression_m:
I remember seeing him being completely surrounded by stray cats on the street once.
Must be nice to be so loved by cats.

1071.name: Caesar
1071.outlook:
There's no record of Caesar in the New Eridu Citizen Verification Profile.
Based on data analysis from previous combat, Caesar has a good Aptitude for Ether
1071.profile_01:
Caesar: Leader of the Sons of Calydon biker gang and a "monarch" in the making.
Her combination of formidable strength and bold, straightforward personality has earned her the love and respect of the Outer Ring's residents.
Although she appears to do things in her own way, she is actually very willing to listen to others' opinions. Caesar actively listens to and implements any valid suggestion she hears — regardless of who it comes from.
She is completely defenseless against those she trusts. Once she accepts someone, she considers them part of her inner circle, treating them with absolute trust.
(Assumption: Caesar currently views you in this way.)

Caesar's father has been missing for as long as she can remember, and her mother passed away from illness when she was young. She was raised by Big Daddy, who took a very hands-off approach to raising her, allowing her to grow up freely and independently.

In addition, Caesar seems to have a curious interest in matters related to romance.
If you wish to get closer to her, you might want to try discussing this topic with her.
1071.profile_02:
Caesar's father was the leader of a biker gang called "Calydon," which carved out a legendary reputation in the Outer Ring. The "Sons of Calydon" take their name from this legacy.
Caesar has a fear of needles.
"They're so tiny and thin, and it only stings for a second when you're pricked — but then all this blood comes out. It's so weird — and definitely not straightforward at all!"

sender_note.sender_note1:
Impression of Caesar:
 · It seems like we now know more about Caesar's... weakness?
sender_note.sender_note2: · It feels like we're not just Caesar's friend, but also comrades in hardship...?
sender_note.sender_note3: · I always feel more relaxed with Caesar. That's just how it is between "buddies."

1071.impression_f:
Big Daddy looks cultured and sophisticated, but Caesar's a different kettle of fish...
But even though she often gets her idioms wrong, Caesar's still very cute!
1071.impression_m:
Earning the trust of the Outer Ring's Overlord is a pretty big deal. We should really appreciate that.
Of course, it'd be nice if Caesar could make fewer typos in her DMs to us.

1151.name: Lucy
1151.outlook:
New Eridu Citizen Verification Profile Info:
Hollow Investigator — Luciana Auxesis Theodoro de Montefio, possessing good Ether aptitude, is allowed to perform basic tasks like investigating and extracting resources in known Hollows within the city (including Companion Hollows).
Note: FYI, Luciana Auxesis Theodoro de Montefio is Lucy's full name.
1151.profile_01:
Lucy is currently in charge of outgoing business and managing boars for the Sons of Calydon.
Since her name is far too long and she doesn't want to be involved with her family, she refers to herself as just "Lucy" in the Outer Ring.
Her three boars are called Grassy, Woody, and Bricky, and they're unceasingly loyal to her.
Though Lucy often speaks with a mixture of rough and elegant language, her actions subtly betray the marks of a proper education.
Lucy's family is incredibly wealthy. She grew up very privileged, with anything she could ever want within grasp... except for freedom.
After her Ether Aptitude test results came back high, Lucy decided she wanted to be a Hollow Investigator, but her family disapproved. She was met with harsh words, isolation and confinement, and emotional abuse which led to her deciding to leave to find her own freedom.
"Hmph! There's no chance I'll ever go back! If I'm found... then I can say goodbye to the stars and sky and I'll have to inherit the family business instead!"
Lucy is extremely competitive. She loves to win and hates losing.
Currently, the one who has given her the most bitter taste of defeat is Caesar, so Lucy keeps challenging Caesar to duels, losing then challenging again, challenging then losing again.
1151.profile_02:
The way Lucy joined the Sons of Calydon was both comedic and dramatic.
To run away from home, she hired some "kidnappers" and devised a kidnapping for herself. Yet, this plan was accidentally screwed up by the Sons of Calydon — Caesar defeated all the "kidnappers" and saved their "victim."
According to eye-witness testimony, the sight of Caesar crashing straight through the door on her ride with the sunlight behind her left quite the impression on Lucy.
"That was when I saw it — freedom."
From then on, Lucy stuck with Caesar, eager to join the Sons of Calydon.

sender_note.sender_note1:
Impressions of Lucy:
 · Never underestimate Lucy's competitiveness.
sender_note.sender_note2: · Lucy's family drama sure is wild
sender_note.sender_note3: · For the stars of the Outer Ring... and chip freedom!

1151.impression_f: Lucy's Knock Knock profile pic is soooo pretty! Is that what she looked like back when she was still living as a rich heiress?
1151.impression_m: I think Caesar mentioned Lucy only uses this profile picture because it's incredibly effective when it comes to talking business with others...

1161.name: Lighter
1161.outlook:
New Eridu Citizen Verification Profile:
Lighter, possessing good Ether aptitude, is allowed to perform basic tasks like investigating and extracting resources in known Hollows within the city (including Companion Hollows).
Note: There is a mental health counselling report among Lighter's records.
1161.profile_01:
Lighter, the Champion of the Sons of Calydon and an ex-mercenary.
In the Outer Ring, the Champion of a team refers to the one responsible for dealing with the opponent's strongest fighter in a gang fight, and they often need to participate in one-on-one duels. Their victory is crucial, as it brings glory and morale to the entire team.
"The Champion can perish, but cannot lose."

A red scarf is what identifies the Champion of the Sons of Calydon.
Even if the opponent doesn't know Lighter, they'll know who he is just from seeing that red scarf.

From what is currently known, Lighter is actually very low profile. He only steals the spotlight on the battlefield when he acts on his obligations as Champion.
Note: Lighter is the second Red Scarf of the Sons of Calydon. He teasingly refers to the previous Red Scarf as "Brother" or "predecessor."
1161.profile_02:
Lighter was once the leader of a mercenary troupe.
After a certain accident, Lighter disbanded his group of mercenaries and ended up in serious debt. Lighter chose to fight in an underground arena to pay back what he owed.
Later, Lighter was discovered by Big Daddy, who paid a huge sum to hire him to join the Sons of Calydon and take Billy's previous position.

sender_note.sender_note1:
Impressions of Lighter:
 · So... how many people has Lighter defeated?
sender_note.sender_note2: · His shades make him look cool, but also bring trouble.
sender_note.sender_note3: · I hope time heals all wounds.

1161.impression_f:
Didn't Lighter say that he'd faint at the sight of blood? And that's why he always keeps his shades on?
Can someone who faints at the sight of blood really be a Champion? And even fight underground boxing matches...?
1161.impression_m: This feels like a poorly crafted excuse...

1171.name: Burnice
1171.outlook:
There's no record of Burnice in the New Eridu Citizen Verification Profile.
Note: Burnice has a good Aptitude for Ether
1171.profile_01:
Burnice, the Nitro-Fuel bartender for the Sons of Calydon.
A hopeless fuel lover. She is responsible for all the fuel used by the machinery owned by the Sons of Calydon.
She seems to have a passion for fuel that overwhelms all else.

Burnice is super outgoing, friendly, and carefree.
She is easily able to spread her emotions to the people around her, bringing them the same optimism she possesses.
"You like the drinks I mix? Thank you! Steeltusk does, too~ That big guy can drink two hundred liters in one go!"
"Do you wanna try its special fuel blend? It's suuuuper hot!"
1171.profile_02:
"Fire can bring warmth, but it can also burn. For someone like this, when used with good intentions, they can keep the cold at bay, but when used with bad intentions... well, that idiot Caesar couldn't think of any bad intentions if her life depended on it."
—From a certain young heiress who wishes to remain anonymous

sender_note.sender_note1:
Impressions of Burnice:
 · Burnice enthusiastically takes care of her companions... maybe a little too enthusiastically.
sender_note.sender_note2: · Dogs love her... Not surprisingly, really.
sender_note.sender_note3: · Burnice gets into trouble sometimes, but she always manages to get out of it. It's like the universe is on her side.

1171.impression_f: Burnice sure makes delicious drinks! No wonder she's famous in the Outer Ring.
1171.impression_m: Yeah, so long as we don't try her blends for Steeltusk.

1281.name: Piper
1281.outlook:
TLDR: Piper has a good Aptitude for Ether.
Note: I believe, considering Piper's personality, she prefers a simple introduction such as this.
1281.profile_01:
Piper is a truck driver for the Sons of Calydon. Apart from driving, she's also responsible for vehicle maintenance and other related jobs.
Her tiny stature, cute voice (though she always seems half-asleep when not driving), and adorably harmless appearance (though she's a shut-in who can't be bothered to take care of her own appearance) make it hard to imagine that she would have such a crazy driving style.
Usually, by the time she drawls out, "Hold~ on~ tight~," the truck is already barreling down the road.
Rumor has it, Piper is a driver who doesn't need brakes. Though riding with her is a terrifying experience, she will always get you where you need to go safely, and in the shortest time possible. Of course, "safely" doesn't include any trauma that may be induced.

Piper has many hobbies that don't seem to match her age, such as reading newspapers, buying lottery tickets, and collecting car magazines.
Piper's biggest wish is to live each day slowly and leisurely.
Note: Please keep in mind, Master, that this is also my wish.
1281.profile_02:
Piper has a love for the sound of truck engines starting up, so she recorded the sound of Steeltusk starting up. She has to listen to the recording to fully wake up in the morning.
If Piper falls asleep during a meeting, playing a recording of a truck engine can quickly get her wide awake again (this intel was provided by Lucy).

sender_note.sender_note1:
Impressions of Piper:
 · Is her personality like a middle-aged man cause she drives a truck? Or does she drive a truck because her personality is like a middle-aged man?
sender_note.sender_note2: · Piper seems to be really lucky... Maybe it'll rub off if we hang out with her more.
sender_note.sender_note3: · Someone who says that people have to look forward must have some reason they're unwilling to look back.

1281.impression_f: Sometimes Piper says "lil ol' me" instead of "I"... Is she trying to be funny...? Or maybe she's shy!
1281.impression_m:
I think it's probably just a catchphrase.
By the way, that last part... Is Fairy trying to complain about us...?

1221.name: Yanagi
1221.outlook:
Hollow Investigative Association Licensing Archive:
Executive Officer Tsukishiro Yanagi, Ether aptitude confidential, is allowed to perform basic tasks like investigating and extracting resources in known Hollows within the city (including Companion Hollows).
Note: Tsukishiro Yanagi has good Ether aptitude and the specific details can be obtained via the Hollow Special Operations system... including a report containing a blood analysis with peculiar results.
1221.profile_01:
Tsukishiro Yanagi, Hollow Special Operations Section 6 Deputy Chief and intelligence officer.
Primarily responsible for personnel management, mission management and feedback, collecting intel, on-site support, etc.
At the same time, Yanagi is also Section 6 member Soukaku's Protector. Apart from taking care of Soukaku's day-to-day affairs, she is also responsible for and takes responsibility for all of Soukaku's behavior at work.

Section 6 Chief Hoshimi Miyabi possesses a rather eccentric personality; Asaba Harumasa, a member of Section 6, is overly relaxed and carefree; and Soukaku, another member of Section, 6 is still an innocent and excitable child, so most of the team's work falls upon Yanagi's shoulders.
Serious, diligent, and meticulous, Tsukishiro Yanagi is the only "normal" person on the team, so to speak. It is only due to her guidance and leadership that the strength of the three who make up Section 6's primary on-field force can be transformed into true combat power.
Overall, Tsukishiro Yanagi is a talented and highly efficient executive officer, whose abilities are both exceptional and comprehensive.
However, from certain data, Tsukishiro Yanagi appears to have a somewhat clumsy side to her when it comes to day-to-day affairs.
1221.profile_02: Due to an accident long ago, Tsukishiro Yanagi appears to possess blood that does not belong to her, flowing through her veins.

sender_note.sender_note1:
Impressions of Tsukishiro Yanagi:
 · Her singing skills sure are shocking.
sender_note.sender_note2: · Her obsession with red bean buns seems perfectly reasonable.
sender_note.sender_note3: · Yanagi... she doesn't seem to just suffer from simple nearsightedness.

1221.impression_f: Where did Fairy even get this info? So even a perfect person like Yanagi has her clumsy moments? Got any specifics to share?
1221.impression_m: How should I put this...? From this data, it feels like Section 6 would fall apart without Yanagi.

0.outlook: In theory, being your average kitten, it shouldn't exhibit any Ether aptitude... In theory that is.
0.profile_01:
{NPC_103174203} is a stray cat often spotted roaming around Sixth Street. People call it Inky because of its dark color.
It's quite cautious and doesn't readily approach humans.
It has a soft spot for canned cat food and tasty lickable treats.
Please note, however, like most stray cats, {NPC_103174203} won't eat in front of you if it doesn't know you well.
Sometimes, {NPC_103174203} might try to communicate its needs, and if you can understand and provide, you're likely to get on its good side. With some effort, perhaps one day it might be open to the idea of being adopted by you.
"Cats seem to be more active at night when there are fewer people around."
0.impression_f:
I've decided! Bro, let's work hard to adopt {NPC_103174203}.
The video store is great, it's just missing a little kitty!
0.impression_m:
Raising a cat isn't easy, Belle, so we should consider it carefully...
Fairy, what flavor of canned food does {NPC_103174203} like?
